attributes.additional_details: It is the responsible thing to do for the  people of the country.  Stop continuing to spread this disease by bringing it back into the UK, only for an already overstretched NHS  to have to deal with more patients
attributes.background: Stop the spread of Coronavirus by stopping flights.   Social distancing is impossible.  Passengers and crew are at risk of infecting one another.  Crew are potentially nursing infected passengers with little or no protection.  It's time for the UK to do this now.

rejection.details:
We have published a petition calling on the Government to close down all UK airports and seaports to prevent further spreading of Covid-19, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
